user_question: total expenses, by vendor , in gurgaon warehouses
refined_question: Total expense by vendor in Gurgaon warehouses
generated_sql:
SELECT 
    qcm.name AS expense_name,
    SUM(il.total_mtd) AS total_expense
FROM 
    `ems-portal-service`.`invoice_info` ii
JOIN 
    `ems-account-service`.`account_warehouse_info` awi ON ii.warehouse_id = awi.warehouse_id
JOIN 
    `ems-warehouse-service`.`warehouse_info` wi ON awi.warehouse_id = wi.id
JOIN 
    `ems-portal-service`.`invoice_line_items` il ON ii.id = il.invoice_id
JOIN 
    `ems-portal-service`.`invoice_line_items_expense` ile ON il.id = ile.invoice_line_item_id
JOIN 
    `ems-portal-service`.`quick_code_master` qcm ON ile.expense_id = qcm.id
WHERE 
    LOWER(wi.city_name) LIKE LOWER('%gurgaon%')
GROUP BY 
    qcm.name LIMIT 1000
